title: Milk Body Cleanser
description: Perfect for if you're looking for soft, nourished skin, our moisturizing body washes are made with skin-natural nutrients that work with your skin to replenish moisture. With a light formula, the bubbly lather leaves your skin feeling cleansed and cared for.

title: Milk Body Lotion
description: An ideal body lotion for dry skin, this product is designed to hydrate and soothe, leaving your skin feeling smooth and supple.

title: Soothing Body Wash
description: A calming body wash with natural extracts to help relax your senses and provide deep hydration to your skin.

title: Exfoliating Scrub
description: Gently exfoliates and renews skin for a radiant, healthy-looking glow. Infused with natural exfoliants.
